title.text: COMMUNICATIVE GOAL-DRIVEN NL GENERATION AND DATA-DRIVEN GRAPHICS GENERATION: AN ARCHITECTURAL SYNTHESIS FOR MULTIMEDIA PAGE GENERATION

abstractContent.text: • In this paper we present a system for automatically producing multimedia pages of information that draws both from results in data-driven aggregation in information visualization and from results in communicative-goal oriented natural language generation.
Our system constitutes an architectural synthesis of these two directions, allowing a beneficial cross-fertilization of research methods.
We suggest that data-driven visualization provides a general approach to aggregation in NLG, and that text planning allows higher user-responsiveness in visualization via automatic diagram design.
